hints: The flavor Chocolate is 1 hours before the flavor Strawberry
The topping Hot Fudge is 2 hours before the flavor Mint
Either The topping Hot Fudge is the hour 1:00 PM or The flavor Mint is the topping Cookies
Either the topping Sprinkles or the flavor Vanilla is the hour 3:00 PM
The hour 4:00 PM is the topping Whipped Cream
The topping Cookies is not the Vanilla flavor
The topping Sprinkles is not the Chocolate flavor
